pr_title: Gh 791 add named operation group label (part of tools Issue #791)

timeline.message: Added label field to AddNamedOperation & Detail
Merge branch 'develop' of github.com:gchq/Gaffer into gh-791-add-named-operation-group-label
GetAllNamedOps handler test for NamedOp label
Added integration test to GetNamedOps with a label
Swagger example for AddNamedOperation with label
Fixed checkstyle changes, updated V2 userId

timeline.bodyText: It might be better to have a list of labels so that named operations can have more than one.
timeline.author: d47853

replies.bodyText: Ah yes it did cross my mind. Having an Operation linked to many groups would be a better feature - and a lot more flexible - I'll make the change thanks
replies.author: macenturalxl1

timeline.author: d47853

replies.bodyText: Agreed, thanks for the recommended solution
replies.author: macenturalxl1

timeline.message: Merge branch 'develop' of github.com:gchq/Gaffer into gh-791-add-named-operation-group-label
Add a list of labels to NamedOperations
